response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is designed to enhance your daily life in numerous ways. With its innovative features and high-quality materials, it's truly a game-changer. I believe in its value and am confident it will meet or exceed your expectations. For this exceptional item, I am proposing a special introductory price of $150. This is an opportunity to experience something truly remarkable at a price that reflects its quality and the benefits it offers. Would you like to proceed with the purchase?", "product_price": 150}
